participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys meeting new people and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: My sister is a published author. I sing karaoke every Thursday night. My favorite color is yellow. I was a champion downhill skier in college.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Social media enthusiast who loves to share his experiences with food and music.
participant_2.background: I post a lot about the food I eat on social media. I like every post I see on social media. When people do not like my social media posts, it upsets me. I am from Austin, Texas.

content.text: Hello! I'm from Austin, Texas. What about you?
Oh, that's cool! What do you like to do in Austin?
I love to eat food and go to concerts.
Me too! What are your favorite restaurants in Austin?
I love Franklin Barbecue and Tacodeli.
Those are both great restaurants! I love Franklin Barbecue's brisket.
Me too! It's the best brisket I've ever had.
I'm glad you agree. What are your favorite concerts you've seen in Austin?
I saw The Killers at ACL Live a few years ago and it was amazing.
I saw them at ACL Live too! It was an incredible show.
It was! I'm so glad I got to see them.
Me too! I'm a big fan of theirs.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It makes it more fun to go to concerts together.
Definitely! I'd love to go to a concert with you sometime.
That would be great! I'll keep an eye out for some good shows.
